text: Deprivation may refer to: ==Necessities or Rights== * Sleep deprivation * Maternal deprivation * Social deprivation * Sensory deprivation * Cultural deprivation * Oxygen deprivation * Water deprivation * Deprivation of food * Nutritional deprivations ==Poverty== * Poverty * Relative deprivation * Poverty threshold * Concentrated poverty * Deprivation index ==Laws== * Forfeiture * Loss of consortium ==Science and medicine== * Monocular deprivation * Language deprivation experiments * Language deprivation * Fluid deprivation test * Androgen deprivation therapy ==Related pages== * Rights
title: Deprivation
